title: Crazy on Daisy
description: Daisy Antelerone has lost everything but attitude. Her ranch is gone, her Momma’s gone, her truck’s busted and she just buried her Daddy. Her sights are on the Texas Rodeo Barrel Racing title, and she'll do whatever it takes to win. . even a crazy bet on bothersome boy-next-door Hank Gallagher.  Hank's a successful rancher with a heart the size of Texas. Desperate for Daisy, he gambles the ranch to fix things between them. Hank finds himself in deep trouble-and deeply in love. Hank's heart is Crazy on Daisy, but his brain tells him he better think twice...........
author: Lilly Christine
